author: EditorDavid
title: Bitcoin Hits an All-Time High of $118,000, Up 21% for 2025
description:
Bitcoin "vaulted to a fresh all-time high Friday, breaking above $118,000," reports Yahoo Finance:

Year to date, the token is up roughly 21%, buoyed in part by crypto-friendly policies from the Trump administration, including the establishment of a strategic…
content: And Has completely stopped all law enforcement around cryptocurrency. So yeah you're going to have a bubble. Nasty one. And pretty soon cryptocurrency will get integrated directly into the economy an… [+308 chars]
